summary: THE VEHICLE STARTED CONSUMING OIL AROUND 80,000 MILES.  AT 90,000 MILES THE ENGINE WAS CONSUMING 1 QUART EVERY 1,000 MILES  AT 110,00 IT WAS CONSUMING 1 QUART EVERY 500 MILES.  AT 117,000 MILES THE VEHICLE CONSUMES 1 QUART EVERY 250 MILES.      IT IS NOT BURNING THE OIL. NO SMOKE AT THE TAILPIPE. NO SMOKE STAINS ON THE BUMPER.  NY STATE EMISSIONS TEST IS FINE WHEN INSPECTED.    IT IS NOT LEAKING THE OIL.  NO OIL PUDDLES UNDER THE CAR.  NO HEAVY ACCUMULATION OF OIL ON THE UNDERCARRIAGE.    HAVE NOT YET TESTED ENGINE COMPRESSION.  WILL DO THAT SOON
